byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Friends of Iranian-American scholar Siamak Namazi report that while in Iran he was arrested by Intelligence officers and taken to Evin Prison, Tehran; Namazi has been advocate for better relations between United States and Iran.
lead_paragraph: Siamak Namazi, a consultant who has advocated better relations between the United States and Iran, was arrested in Tehran around Oct. 15, according to people close to him.

headline.main: Iran Is Said to Detain Another Iranian-American
headline.print_headline: Iran Is Said to Detain Another Iranian-American

snippet: Siamak Namazi, a consultant who has advocated better relations between the United States and Iran, was arrested in Tehran around Oct. 15, according to people close to him.
